notes:
The DEMO works out of the box, but with distorted sound. 
The solution that worked for me was go to... /compatdata/673030/pfx  and edit the user.cfg file. 
At the end of the  [Software\\Wine\\DllOverrides]  section, I  added "xaudio2_7"="native,builtin"  and now the sound works fine... 

For to quit the game, I have to die or use alt+F4.
title: Damned Hours Demo
